sub_title: TRANSLATION & LOCALIZATION • PROOFREADING • POST-EDITING (Dutch • English • French • Italian into German)
summary:
DIVERSITY and EXPERIENCE are my ABILITIES - SATISFIED CUSTOMERS my POWER SOURCE!

Do you need translations & localization, a proofreading or post-editing (Dutch/German, English/German, French/German, Italian/German)? Do not hesitate to contact me! I am a native German! Bilingual (Dutch/German).

Gymnasium - banking - almost 19 years of international experience in my own b2b advertising & marketing agency – bilingual – after ended partnership lots of even more experience in advertising, marketing, PR, trade show presentations and .... in every single job since 1991: TRANSLATIONS!

I always worked with conviction and pleasure. My clients, project managers, earlier partners, employers and also the organizations for which I worked as a volunteer for years, trust(ed) me and I never let them down. Whatever I do, I am a reliable and responsible partner. 

And I feel lucky to be able to serve wonderful clients, good people, sympathetic people and very competent people, loyal people. For them I go the extra mile - with pleasure.

On the other hand they frequently assure me of their satisfaction with my work and our good cooperation. That's my power source and makes me love my work!

"YOU SEEM TO HAVE FOUND YOUR NICE" a good old friend in the US once said to me...

If you may want to know if I have the required experience in your industry as well, please be sure to check out my little website https://afs-pr-communications.business.site/. Of course you can also just ask me, with a message via my website, via LinkedIn or just by e-mail.



ABOUT  CONFIDENTIALITY 

Confidentiality and privacy is a top priority for you. Of course, if I will work for you, I will be willing to sign a NDA - and I will respect it! That is the reason I cannot show anything of my work here on LinkedIn.



CERTIFICATE OF GOOD CONDUCT (VOG)

I can submit a Certificate of Good Conduct (Verklaring Omtrent het Gedrag, VOG) for translations of sensitive information, which I recently applied for in the Netherlands. This is written in Dutch, but is provided with an English summary.

For the Dutch speaking readers: Please refer to my interview with Fairlingo. https://www.fairlingo.com/over-het-duits-interview-met-vertaalster-angelika/
